lines.text: That son-of-a-bitch threw his panties in my face?
Choose money over honey? Shiiiiit. Man, you can pull out my groin, just gimme that coin! Man, I'd rather be dead than not have any bread! Pinky's mama didn't raise no fool!
I'm gonna make you sweat one way... and then the other.
Come on back if you want some more! If you want some more, then come on back!
I'll make you look like a sick faggot.

[in the dark dojo]
I'm gonna shoot. Goddammit, I'm gonna shoot!
Wesley, I'm gonna slap the black off you.

[to Jones]
My cookie would kill you!
